data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Dani Alves's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sao Paulo.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) strikes at São Januario but his header is cleared.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 9, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Tche Tche gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo are coming forward and Tche Tche gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulinho of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 12, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama's Fernando Miguel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Fernando Miguel is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 15, Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 17, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 20, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Talles Magno (Vasco da Gama) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
At São Januario, Igor Gomes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Martin Benitez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 31, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Vasco da Gama's Andrey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Liziero for Sao Paulo has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 37, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 38, Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tche Tche (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sao Paulo's Igor Gomes gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 43, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Igor Gomes, who is grimacing with pain.
Sao Paulo's Igor Gomes is back in action after a slight knock.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama drive forward but German Cano is judged offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Wilton Pereira Sampaio has blown to start the second-half.
Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Bruno Gomes replacing Gabriel Pec.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Bruno Gomes is booked for the home team.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 50, Dani Alves of Sao Paulo is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Paulinho hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Sao Paulo in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Sao Paulo push upfield and Dani Alves gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Vasco da Gama defence.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 62, German Cano is on target to give Vasco da Gama a 1-0 advantage.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Cayo Tenorio (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's first substitution at São Januario with Gabriel replacing Liziero.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reinaldo (Sao Paulo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 74, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
It's now 2-0 in Rio de Janeiro as German Cano scores for Vasco da Gama.
Andrey with an assist there.
In Rio de Janeiro Sao Paulo drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 76, Helinho is on a sub for Igor Gomes for Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 77, Free kick Sao Paulo.
The home team have replaced Fellipe Bastos with Neto Borges. This is the second substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 80, Igor Vinicius is replacing Juanfran for the away team.
The away team replace Tche Tche with Gonzalo Carneiro.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 82, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 82, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Sao Paulo's Robert Arboleda has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
The home team replace Martin Benitez with Guilherme Parede.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a fourth substitution, with Miranda replacing Cayo Tenorio.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sao Paulo's Igor Vinicius misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
At São Januario the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a penalty in Rio de Janeiro...
Reinaldo (Sao Paulo) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Rio de Janeiro.
Sao Paulo have been given a penalty...
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Reinaldo's penalty pulls one back for Sao Paulo at São Januario.
